segments.text: Hello again ! Here's another fruit tray for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , hi again ! Hey , the fruit looks different this time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I make each one a little different . It's a way for me to express my creativity !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It looks really artistic ! How did you learn to do that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , look at your table ! I'll help you clear it off .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know , art is something I've always been interested in ...
segments.speaker: S2
